AUTORESPONDER.GUIDE:
This is your control center to manage autoresponders in **{{guild}}!** To get started, check the available actions below. {{emoji}}
{{statusEmoji}} The AR module currently is **{{status}}**.

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}ar enable`**
> First-time using my AR module? then look no further, enable the module before doing everything else!

**`{{prefix}}ar add <trigger> - <response>`**
> Let's add a new AR! fill the <trigger> with message you want me to listen and <response> as my response to it!
__e.g. {{prefix}}ar add welcome - enjoy your stay!__

**`{{prefix}}ar delete <id/trigger>`**
> Got bored with the AR? then it's time to delete it! fill the <id/trigger> with the AR you want to delete.
e.g. __{{prefix}}ar delete welcome__

**`{{prefix}}ar info`**
> Having hard time remembering all the ARs you just registered? let's check them through this action!

**`{{prefix}}ar reset`**
> How many ARs you've created already?! too many? oh well... restarting from scratch will be a better option I think.

**`{{prefix}}ar disable`**
> ARs aren't fun anymore? aw, don't worry then. You can disable the entire ARs anytime!

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
AUTORESPONDER.INVALID_ACTION:
**Eeh, what action was that??** {{emoji}}
╰─I only accept {{actions}}.
AUTORESPONDER.ALREADY_ENABLED: The AR module has been enabled by **{{user}}**, **{{time}}.** {{emoji}}
AUTORESPONDER.SUCCESSFULLY_ENABLED:
**Yay! AR successfully enabled!♡** {{emoji}}
╰─Now it's time to create some cute autoresponders!
AUTORESPONDER.ALREADY_DISABLED:
**Wait, AR module isn't even enabled!** {{emoji}}
╰─Go type **`{{prefix}}ar enable`** to enable it!
AUTORESPONDER.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED:
**Alright, it's done!♡** {{emoji}}
╰─The AR module has successfully disabled!
AUTORESPONDER.EMPTY:
**Oops, empty ARs.** {{emoji}}
╰─Try create some with **`{{prefix}}ar add <trigger> - <response>`**
AUTORESPONDER.REGISTER_NO_PARAM:
**Don't forget to follow the format!♡**
e.g **`{{prefix}}ar add I'm kawaii - no way, I'm more kawaii.`**
AUTORESPONDER.REGISTER_MISSING_SEPARATOR:
**Oops, you were missing the separator.**
e.g **`{{prefix}}ar add {{trigger}} - <myResponseHere>`**
AUTORESPONDER.REGISTER_EMPTY_RESPONSE:
**What's my response supposed to be?** {{emoji}}
╰─try type **`{{prefix}}ar add {{trigger}} - <myResponseHere>`**
AUTORESPONDER.REGISTER_SUCCESSFUL:
**Yay! I've learned new AR!♡** {{emoji}}
╰─Keep in mind, there's 15s cooldown for each AR to avoid spam.
AUTORESPONDER.RESET_CONFIRMATION:
╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮
**Reset ARs from this server?** {{emoji}}
This action is irreversible and **{{totalArs}}** ARs will be deleted once you pressed the green button.
╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
AUTORESPONDER.SUCCESSFULLY_RESET:
**Baibai my precious ARs!!**
╰─{{totalArs}} autoresponders successfully deleted from this server!
AUTORESPONDER.DELETE_MISSING_KEYWORD:
╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮
**Is there any ARs you want to delete?**
Start by typing **`{{prefix}}ar delete <ID/triggerName>`**
╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
Below are the registered ARs in {{guild}}.
{{list}}
AUTORESPONDER.DELETE_TARGET_INVALID:
**Is that AR even exists??** {{emoji}}
╰─Make sure to check the registered ARs first!
AUTORESPONDER.SUCCESSFULLY_DELETED:
**Aye, successfully deleted!♡** {{emoji}}
╰─I'm no longer listening to that AR.

HELP.LANDING:
Are you looking for a quick start?{{emoji}}
╭*:;,．★ ～☆*────────╮
**`{{prefix}}level`**
> Check how much exp you get after those hours of chit-chatting. I can see how talkative you are just from this. ;)

**`{{prefix}}bal`**
> Have you ever wondered, how many artcoins you are currently have in your account right now? This is important thing to do in order to impress your friend, tehee.

**`{{prefix}}daily`**
> Did you hear 'freebies'? yes, I reward you free 250 artcoins for every 23 hours! So, make sure to not skip it, okay!?

**`{{prefix}}leaderboard`**
> Curious who got the highest exp, artcoins and fame points in your server? Now it's time to take your throne.

**`{{prefix}}profile`**
> Here you will be able to see your current rank, level, artcoins and fame points at a glance. It may be plain at first, but hey; we'll decorate it together!
╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
For comprehensive list, take a look at Commandpedia by pressing the :book: button on this message.

COMMANDPEDIA.USAGE_EXAMPLES: Use **{{prefix}}help <name/category>** to get information about a command or category.

HELP.UNABLE_TO_FIND_COMMAND:
**Wait, what was that?**
╰─ I don't remember if I ever have this type of command. {{emoji}}

INVALID_USER: Sorry, I couldn't find that user.

INVENTORY.AUTHOR_EMPTY: You don't have any items in your bag.
INVENTORY.OTHER_USER_EMPTY: **{{user}}** don't have any items in their bag.

INVITE_LINK_SENT: {{emoji}}  **I've sent the invite link to your DM!**

LEADERBOARD.GUIDE:
Did you know this guild has its own ranking leaderboard? check out the commands below! {{emoji}}

**`{{prefix}}lb exp`**
> List of user with highest experience points & level. Their hours of chit-chatting do really pay off.

**`{{prefix}}lb bal`**
> List of rich users with the highest balance account. They are either coming from rich family or dedicating their time on grinding coins.

**`{{prefix}}lb fame`**
> List of most-loved users with highest popularity of fame points. They are way too fabulous for my taste.

start by typing **`{{prefix}}setrelationship`**

SELLFRAGMENTS.GUIDE:
I know you are probably tired looking at your collected fragments sitting there in your inventory doing nothing. But fortunately, with this command it will allows you to sell those fragments for a few amount of artcoins! interested to try? follow the format below. {{emoji}}

`{{prefix}}sellfrag <amount/all>`
e.g. __{{prefix}}sellfrag 10__ or __{{prefix}}sellfrag all__

> Keep in mind, the conversion rate is **{{rate}}**, so you need to have at least {{emojiFragment}}**{{min}} Fragments** in order to use this command!
SELLFRAGMENTS.EMPTY_FRAGMENTS: Oops, what you are trying to do? you don't even have any fragments to sell. {{emoji}}
SELLFRAGMENTS.INVALID_AMOUNT: Please type a proper number or `all` to sell all your available fragments.
SELLFRAGMENTS.AMOUNT_TOO_LOW: You need to put at least {{emoji}}**{{amount}} Fragments** to sell.
SELLFRAGMENTS.CONFIRMATION: You are going to sell {{fragmentsEmoji}}**{{fragmentsAmount}}** for {{artcoinsEmoji}}**{{artcoinsAmount}}**. Shall we continue?

SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.GUIDE:
Use one of the following action to enable or disable levelup-message module in this guild. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg enable`**
> By enabling this module, your guild will receive levelup message whenever someone is leveling up (obviously).

**`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg channel #targetchannel`**
> Some of you may want it to be sent in a tidy place- so your chatting experience stays uninterrupted. Luckily, you can set a custom-channel for it!
__e.g. {{prefix}}setlvlupmsg channel #bread__

**`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg disable`**
> Getting tired of annoying level-up message? then it's time to disable it.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.INVALID_ACTION: Sorry, I only accept **`enable`**, **`disable`**, and **`channel`** action in this module.
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.ALREADY_ENABLED: The Level Up Message already enabled by **{{user}}, {{date}}**
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.ALREADY_DISABLED:
**The Level Up Message hasn't been enabled yet in this guild-♡**
╰─To enable, type **`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg enable`**
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.SUCCESSFULLY_ENABLED: Yay! **Level-up Message Module** has been successfully enabled in this guild!
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED:
Done! **Level-up Message Module** has been successfully disabled!
this guild won't receive any level-up message again in the future.
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.DISPLAY_REGISTERED_CHANNEL:
**Currently I'm sending it to {{channel}}♡**
╰─If you wish to switch the channel, kindly type
╰─**`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg channel #yournewchannel!`**
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.DISPLAY_UNREACHABLE_CHANNEL:
**I think the previously registered channel was deleted...**
╰─Want to update it? type **`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg channel #yournewchannel!`**
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.SUCCESSFULLY_RESET_CHANNEL:
**Aye aye, the configuration has been reset to default!**{{emoji}}
╰─Now the level-up message will be sent to any channels!
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.MISSING_CHANNEL_PARAMETER:
**Currently I'm sending it to any channels!♡**
╰─If you wish to use custom channel, type the format below
╰─**`{{prefix}}setlvlupmsg channel #channelname`**
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.INVALID_CHANNEL: **Oopsie- this doesn't seem to be a valid channel ...** {{emoji}}
SETLEVELUPMESSAGE.SUCCESSFULLY_SET_CHANNEL:
**Okay, everything set up!**{{emoji}}
╰─The next level-up will be sent to {{channel}}!

SETEXP.GUIDE:
This is your main control center for configuring the **EXP Leveling Module**. Below are the available actions you can use. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setexp enable`**
> By default, this module is automatically enabled after I got invited to this guild. But in case you've disabled it, you can enable the module again through this action.

**`{{prefix}}setexp disable`**
> Tired of getting in a level competition with your friend? you can disable the module anytime through this action.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯

This is your control center for configuring the **Logs System**. Check out what are the available actions for this module:

*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setlog enable`**

e.g. __{{prefix}}setlogs channel #logs__

**`{{prefix}}setlogs disable`**
> I know you are probably feeling annoyed getting all the useless logs from me, that's why this action exists.

SETRANK.GUIDE:
This is your control center for configuring custom role-ranking system in the guild! now use the following actions to begin the configuration. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setrank enable`**
> If you are new to rank configuration, try use this action first and I'll guide you until the rest part.

**`{{prefix}}setrank add <role> <requiredLevel>`**
> This action registers the given role into the role-rank system and let you define the required level in order to get it.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setrank add @Kawaii 15__

**`{{prefix}}setrank delete <role>`**
> This action deletes the specified role from the rank system of this guild and make sure to have at least two registered role-rank before deleting it.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setrank delete @Kawaii__

**`{{prefix}}setrank info`**
> This action displays the current configurations of role-rank system in the guild.

**`{{prefix}}setrank reset`**
> This action wipes out all the existing role-rank configuration in the guild and it'll use the default one. It's a good thing to-do if you want to start from scratch again.

**`{{prefix}}setrank disable`**
> This action disables the role-rank system in the guild. Although, your previous configuration won't be deleted and you can enable it again anytime.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
SETRANK.ADD_MISSING_ARG:
Don't forget to include the role name and the required level for it!
e.g. __{{prefix}}setrank add @Kawaii 10__
SETRANK.ADD_MISSING_TARGET_ROLE:
**Include the role and the required level to get it♡**
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setrank add @cupcake 10`**
SETRANK.ADD_ROLE_ALREADY_REGISTERED: Sorry, but this role has been registered as **LV{{level}}** rank by **{{user}}**, **{{date}}**! If you wish to delete the configuration for this rank, you can type **`{{prefix}}setrank delete {{role}}`** instead.
SETRANK.ADD_MISSING_REQUIRED_LEVEL:
**Don't forget to include the required level!♡**
e.g. **`{{prefix}}setrank add {{role}} 15`**
SETRANK.ADD_INVALID_REQUIRED_LEVEL: Please only put a valid number (in the range of 1 ~ 999)!
SETRANK.DELETE_UNREGISTERED_ROLE: Eh, what are you trying to delete? this rank-role isn't even registered!
SETRANK.INVALID_ACTION: Sorry, but I don't recognize that action. :(
SETRANK.ALREADY_ENABLED: This module has been enabled by **{{user}}, {{date}}**
SETRANK.ALREADY_DISABLED:
**The Custom Rank has not been enabled yet♡**
To enable, type **`{{prefix}}setrank enable`**
SETRANK.RESET_NULL_RANKS: Sorry! It's not like I dont wanna do it ... but this guild doesn't have any registered ranks for me to reset-
SETRANK.RESET_CONFIRMATION: This will delete all custom ranks in the guild, are you sure you want to perform this action?
SETRANK.RESET_CONFIRMATION_WARN: The effect cannot be undone once you pressed the green button.
SETRANK.SUCCESSFULLY_RESET: **Done! Custom Ranks Configurations in this guild are successfully deleted!**
SETRANK.FIRST_TIMER_TIP: Want to register your first rank-role? let's type `{{prefix}}setrank add <role> <requiredLevel>` !
SETRANK.INFO_DISABLED_FIRST_TIME: This module status is {{emoji}} **disabled** in {{guild}}! if you wish to setup a Custom Rank Module in this guild, feel free to start by typing `{{prefix}}setrank enable`
SETRANK.INFO_DISABLED_BY_USER: This module got {{emoji}} **disabled** by **{{user}}, {{date}}**. If you want to enable it back, you can do so by typing `{{prefix}}setrank enable`
SETRANK.INFO_ENABLED_ZERO_RANKS:
This module status is {{emoji}} **enabled** in {{guild}}, but unfortunately they seem haven't setting up the rank-role yet. So, make sure to setup it by typing:
`{{prefix}}setrank add <role> <requiredLevel>`
SETRANK.INFO_ENABLED:
Oh, this module status is {{emoji}} **enabled** in {{guild}}! currently there are total of **{{rankSize}}** available ranks here which you can take a look at the complete list below:
{{list}}
SETRANK.SUCCESSFULLY_ADDED:
Your member will start getting the **{{role}}** role once they reached **LV{{level}}**.
If there's member who already surpassed the required level, then they will get it once they leveled up.
SETRANK.SUCCESSFULLY_DELETED: **{{role}}** has been successfully removed from the rank-role configurations of this guild. Keep in mind, the existing member may still have the role attached if you don't delete it manually.
SETRANK.SUCCESSFULLY_ENABLED: Yay! **Custom Rank Module** has been successfully enabled in this guild!
SETRANK.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED: Done! **Custom Rank Module** has been successfully disabled in this guild!
SETRANK.ROLE_TOO_HIGH: Uhh, **{{role}}** is unreachable and too high! can you move it under **{{annieRole}}** role first? {{emoji}}

SETWELCOMER.GUIDE:
Use one of the following action to start setup welcomer module for this guild. {{emoji}}

╭*:;,．★ ～☆*──────────╮

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer enable`**
> One first step you might want to try to make sure this module is enabled in the guild.

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer channel <targetChannel>`**
> Set the target channel where you want the welcomer message to be sent in.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setwelcomer channel #general__

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer text <message>`**
> You can make a unique customized welcomer message for this guild. Include {{guild}} or {{user}} for socketing.
e.g. __{{prefix}}setwelcomer text Hi, cuttie {{user}}!__

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer role <roles>`**
> Let's reward them for joining this cute server with some sweet roles!
e.g. __{{prefix}}setwelcomer roles @muffins @cupcake__

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer preview`**
> Wanna see how's your welcomer looks like before your comrades see it?

**`{{prefix}}setwelcomer disable`**
> Tired of spammy welcomer message? you can disable this module anytime.

╰──────────☆～*:;,．*╯
SETWELCOMER.INVALID_ACTION:
Sorry- I only recognize the following actions
**`{{availableActions}}`**
SETWELCOMER.SUCCESSFULLY_ENABLED: **Welcomer Module** has been successfully enabled in this guild!
SETWELCOMER.ALREADY_DISABLED:
**Welcomer hasn't been enabled yet in this guild.**
To enable it, use **`{{prefix}}setwelcomer enable`**
SETWELCOMER.SUCCESSFULLY_DISABLED: **Welcomer Module** has been successfully disabled in this guild!

SETWELCOMER.EMPTY_ROLE_PARAMETER:

STRIKE.GUIDE:
